title: Finish coding project
description: Complete the final version of the project and submit it for review

title: Buy groceries
description: Milk, eggs, bread, cheese, vegetables, fruits

title: Clean the house
description: Vacuum the floors, dust the furniture, and do the laundry

title: Read a book
description: Choose a book from the library and read at least one chapter

title: Go for a run
description: Jog around the park for at least 30 minutes

title: Practice playing the guitar
description: Learn a new song or practice a difficult chord progression

title: Attend a yoga class
description: Join a local yoga studio and attend a beginner's class

title: Schedule a dentist appointment
description: Call the dentist's office and schedule a check-up

title: Watch a movie
description: Choose a movie from your watchlist and watch it

title: Finish reading a novel
description: Read the last chapter of the novel you've been reading
